statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 2 , -8 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 1 , -6 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 4 , -6 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 1 , 2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
